QuestData.Title: Locked and Loaded
QuestData.Description: $n, come in. Can you read me?$b$bThe battle is about to start. I hope you've delivered all of those packages.$b$bI need you here in Flame Crest, NOW.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Hurry back to Flame Crest! It is nearly time for the battle!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Eitrigg at Flame Crest in Burning Steppes.
QuestData.RewardText: $n's here! We can get started.$b$bThis is our big moment, $n. I hope you are prepared.
